DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare ability low calorie high carbohydrate low calorie high fat/protein diet decrease abdominal fat overweight obese subject . The investigator also test effect diet secondary outcome include body composition , fluid electrolyte balance , lipids lipoprotein , blood pressure , arterial compliance , glucose insulin metabolism , bone turnover , measure satiety .
DOC.brief_title: High Carbohydrate vs. High Fat Diets Treatment Obesity ( JBR 0512 )
DOC.detailed_description: Participation study require 2 screen visit outpatient clinic , participant qualify , 10 inpatient study week . Subjects admit Rockefeller University Hospital 10 week in-patient phase study . The first 2 week consist weight stabilization period , subject require consume average American diet . This follow 6 week weight loss period subject randomize either low calorie high carbohydrate low calorie high fat/protein diet . On diet 50 % calorie deficit compare weight stabilization period . This follow 2 week weight maintenance period calorie add diet maintain new weight . Appropriate adjustment make keep subject 's weight stable . During entire inpatient study , subject consume one multivitamin per day ( Centrum , always complete , A Zinc ) one iron supplement per day . In addition , unlimited access zero calorie liquid ( water/diet soda ) available encourage maintain one 's usual activity level . Females reproductive age , need make sure become pregnant inpatient study . Urine test pregnancy stabilization weight maintenance phase study .
DOC.criteria: Man woman body mass index ( BMI ) 30 34.9 Man BMI 25 29.9 waist circumference > 102cm ( 40in ) Woman BMI 25 29.9 waist circumference > 88cm ( 35in ) High Blood Pressure High Cholesterol Diabetes HIV positive Syphilis Hepatitis B/C positive
